meta.title: Leandro Damasio. Welcome to My Personal Page
desc: I am an AI Engineer at Enforce (BTG Pactual Group), based in São Paulo, Brazil.

I build production-grade AI systems for financial and legal domains, where reliability, observability, and governance are not optional, they are foundation. My work focuses on making AI systems safe to operate in real decision-making workflows, especially in regulated environments.

My work sits at the intersection of AI, software architecture, and infrastructure. I design agentic architectures, define runtime control loops, and build evaluation and monitoring pipelines for LLM-based systems. I work hands-on with vector search using pgvector and ParadeDB, prompt and context governance, and secure integration with internal and external data sources.
I place strong emphasis on versioning, auditability, and traceability, ensuring AI systems meet technical, legal, and risk requirements as they evolve in production.

Beyond my role at Enforce, I am active in AI-first development and agentic systems beyond the corporate setting. I am the creator and maintainer of an open-source monorepo at RBX Systems, where I work on AI agents, code agents, and system-level tooling, always with a focus on architecture and long-term maintainability.

I enjoy collaborating across Software Engineering, DevOps, UX, and Product, and I am especially interested in agentic runtimes, memory and context management, and the boundary between model capabilities and system-level control.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.desc: I am an AI Engineer at Enforce (BTG Pactual Group), based in São Paulo, Brazil. I build production-grade AI systems for financial and legal domains.
aboutMe.bio: Leandro Damasio began his career as an Engineer in the 1990s, with the PHP language. Since then, he has distinguished himself as an experienced and innovative software engineer, working on development projects for major companies and institutions such as FAPESP, NPL Brasil, Global Hitss, Arte Arena, and Stefanini.

highlights.name: Robson Bot
highlights.description: O ROBSON BOT, um bot de negociação de criptomoedas de código aberto em Python, utiliza arquitetura assíncrona e multilocatário para decisões baseadas em análises probabilísticas e técnicas. Inclui gerenciamento de risco, disseminação de sinais, estratégias de negociação, plataforma React para o painel e Kubernetes para segurança em múltiplos usuários.
highlights.technologies: python, django, react, docker, kubernetes, git

highlights.name: Financial Fraud Detection RF XGBoost
highlights.description: This project focuses on developing a robust fraud detection system using machine learning algorithms. It compares the performance of two popular ensemble methods: Random Forest and XGBoost, in classifying financial transactions as fraudulent or legitimate. The models are trained and evaluated on a real-world financial dataset.
highlights.technologies: random forest, xgboost, scikit-learn, pandas, numpy

highlights.name: Product Catalog Leads
highlights.description: Sales management software with product catalog and customer data capture.

highlights.name: GPT4 LangChain Chatbot
highlights.description: This project showcases development of an intelligent chatbot using the powerful GPT-4 language model and the LangChain framework. It demonstrates how to build a conversational AI capable of understanding and responding to user queries in a natural and engaging way.

highlights.name: MSX API v1.0
highlights.description: A RESTful API in Python, using FastAPI, that allows creation, reading, updating, and deletion of vehicle records, with basic authentication and automatic documentation features. It was built with TDD and uses libraries such as pydantic, SQL Alchemy, Alembic, PyJWT, argon2.
highlights.technologies: python, fastapi, sql alchemy, alembic, pyjwt, argon2, pydantic

highlights.name: Space
highlights.description: Space Arena ERP. Frontend in React and Next.js. Robust, secure, reliable, and optimized backends built with Go, PHP, Laravel, offering a RESTful API for production, administration, and management sectors, as well as a layer for interaction with end customers. It utilizes modern architectural patterns to ensure scalability and maintainability.
highlights.technologies: PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Docker, Kubernetes, Git

curriculum.name: Leandro Damasio
curriculum.headline: Principal Software Engineer | Cloud and DevOps Specialist | AI/ML Engineer
curriculum.resume: Results-oriented Full-Stack Software Engineer and AI/ML Specialist with over 10 years of experience architecting and deploying scalable data products, advanced predictive models, and robust cloud-native solutions. Demonstrates comprehensive expertise across entire software development lifecycle, spanning architectural design, implementation, and DevOps automation, within industrial, financial, commercial, and research sectors. Proficiently utilizes Python, JavaScript, and leading cloud platforms to foster innovation and solve complex challenges. Employs asynchronous communication and distributed task management to build highly optimized systems, ensuring secure and stable performance to meet critical business demands. Committed to agile methodologies, promoting collaborative client engagement and continuous delivery.

professionalExperience.title: AI Engineer
description: Enforce is part of BTG Pactual Group and focuses on distressed credit and asset management.

Designed and implemented "Forja", an internal LLM experimentation and governance platform with RAG pipelines, vector databases (pgvector/ParadeDB) and prompt versioning, reducing the time to test new AI workflows from days to hours for data and product teams.
Built "Prompt-Maker", a FastAPI backend to centralize prompt and workflow governance, enabling consistent, auditable use of Generative AI across multiple internal systems.

Developed the conversational assistant "Atena", connecting LLMs to legal and financial data through retrieval pipelines and embeddings, significantly reducing analysis time for complex documents and cases.
Contributed to the legal analytics platform "Fase", integrating AI components into credit recovery and legal workflows, improving visibility and decision support for high-volume portfolios.
Structured a Kubernetes (k3s) + ArgoCD + GitOps environment for AI services, standardizing deployments, isolation and monitoring of GenAI workloads.

Promoted AI Engineering best practices — versioning, observability, evaluation and compliance-aware design — to ensure that AI systems are robust, traceable and aligned with financial-sector requirements.
Tech: Python, FastAPI, Kubernetes (k3s), ArgoCD, GitOps, Postgres/ParadeDB, pgvector, RAG pipelines, LLMs, embeddings, CI/CD, observability.
